title: Public Keys: Ethereum Treasuries Soar, Bitcoin ETFs' $1 Billion Bleed, Crypto IPO Chatter
text: Fed hints spark crypto rally as Bitcoin ETFs bleed $1B, but Ethereum bounces back. Plus, Figure Technologies is eyeing an IPO.

title: Bitcoin Neutral, Ethereum Strengthening: Divergence in Flow Data Raises Eyebrows
text: Bitcoin pulled back from $123,000 to near $113,000 while exchange reserves remained largely unchanged, indicating a potential short-term correction risk in the near future.

title: Real Vision CEO Raoul Pal Calls ‘Full Port' Into XRP, Ethereum
text: Market expert Raoul Pal has commented on the possibility of an altcoin season using what he described as the ‘Crypto Waiting Room.' He claimed that many altcoins are preparing for a parabolic rally, led by Ethereum, SOL, and XRP.

title: Why Ethereum Just Posted Its Third-Biggest Month in History
text: Ethereum's transaction volume hit $320B in August 2025, its third-highest ever, fueled by institutional demand and ETF growth.
